size: 5 kg per dumbbell (set of 2 = 10 kg total)
usage: resistance training, fitness classes, at-home workouts to tone and sculpt arms, shoulders, and back
key_features: Set of 2 dumbbells for resistance training
Hexagonal shape for easy stacking and roll-free use
Easy-grip neoprene coating for secure hold
ai_description: A pair of vibrant pink dumbbells with a smooth neoprene coating that provides a comfortable, non-slip grip. The dumbbells feature a practical hexagonal shape that prevents rolling and allows for stable stacking. White branding on the ends displays 'KAKSS' and the weight designation. The product appears well-constructed with a solid cast iron core encased in durable pink neoprene, designed for both functionality and visual appeal in home gym settings.
